summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to the Seattle City Light Department; amending Seattle Municipal Code Sections 21.48.060 and 21.48.070 (Sections 6 and 7 of Ordinance 109218, as amended by Ordinance 109621); relating to the Seattle City Light Department and prescribing the rates, terms and conditions for the use and sale of electricity thereof; and revising certain industrial rates schedules.
